page.title: 15A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY:B.BALESTER
page.content: After ten hours sleep my mum wakes me up at 7.45am and I get out of bed at 8am. I get dressed and go downstairs to the first floor and go into the bathroom. I look into the mirror to see my hair sticking out all over as if I've had an electric shock!I walk downstairs, passing my brother running upstairs in a hurry. I get downstairs to see Wincey Willis forecasting the weather on television. I walk into the kitchen sit down and have my breakfast, which is cereal, or eggs.When I finish I take the dog for a walk, and leave for school. I reach school at 8.45am, and we then have ten minutes playtime. We have our Assembly in the morning and after that we have register and spellings or we have to do some writing. We then have our morning break and after that, we do maths.
